name: 49 Degrees North
description: Hiding away in the northeast corner of Washington state, 49° North holds some of the best glade skiing and riding on the planet. Paired with long consistent slopes, world-class grooming, and light, dry powder, it's sure to bring a smile to all who visit. Eastern Washington's largest ski area hosts an awesome variety of skiing and riding in each of its 3 basins, with over 2,300 acres, 88 runs, 7 lifts and 2 summits, there is something for the whole family, but you will find one thing absent... crowds. Located just 60 miles from Spokane International Airport, it's easy to explore more at 49° North... more laps, more terrain, more mountains, more fun!
